headline: ALCATEL TURBO PUMP 325 L/S REBUILT
description: Rebuilt   Turbo Pump   with CFF 450 Controller
keywords: turbomolecular pump turbo pumps turbos drag pumps
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Turbo Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Alcatel
Model TMP5402CP
Pumping Speed Nitrogen 325.0 l/s (688.7 CFM)
Ultimate Pressure 7.50E-7(En) torr (10.00E-7 mbar)
Inlet Flange ISO-K 100.0 mm (3.937 in)
Foreline Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Controller Model/Part Number CFF 450
Cables Included No
Duty--Service Corrosive
Inlet Screen Included No
Bearing Type Ceramic
Installation Orientation Any
Rotational Speed 27,000 RPM
External Cooling Water Cooled
Other Information N2 bearings purge
Water connection 3/16" tube
Exterior Dimensions
Width 8.000 in (20.3 cm)
Height 10.500 in (26.7 cm)
Weight 20 lb (9 kg)
